member.name: F:NExtra.WPF.Controls.ThreeState.Undetermined
member.summary: When a ThreeState control is in this state, sub-groups are both checked and unchecked.

member.name: F:NExtra.WPF.Controls.ThreeState.Unchecked
member.summary: When a ThreeState control is in this state, it is unchecked.

member.name: F:NExtra.WPF.Controls.ThreeState.Checked
member.summary: When a ThreeState control is in this state, it is checked.
